materials.raw_text: Hg (Mercury) - 33.6 g, Nd (Neodymium) - 11.2 g, Pb (Lead) - 100.8 g, Sm (Samarium) - 11.2 g

sourcing.instructions: Hg: Chemical suppliers or specialized metal distributors. Nd: Rare earth material suppliers. Pb: Metal suppliers or hardware stores. Sm: Rare earth material suppliers.
steps: Hg: Chemical suppliers or specialized metal distributors. Nd: Rare earth material suppliers. Pb: Metal suppliers or hardware stores. Sm: Rare earth material suppliers.

1. Measure each ingredient using a precision scale. 2. In a fume hood or well-ventilated area, combine Hg, Nd, Pb, and Sm in a clean glass beaker. 3. Stir the mixture gently with a glass rod until homogeneous.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure each ingredient using a precision scale. 2. In a fume hood or well-ventilated area, combine Hg, Nd, Pb, and Sm in a clean glass beaker. 3. Stir the mixture gently with a glass rod until homogeneous.

heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture to a crucible. 2. Heat the crucible in a muffle furnace to 600째C. 3. Maintain this temperature for 2 hours to ensure complete melting and mixing of the materials.
